page.description: Extracts hours, minutes, or seconds from a Short time value. TimePart is 'h', 'm', or 's'
page.syntax: Result as N = ShortTime_Extract(Y shortTime ,C TimePart )

argument.name: Result
argument.description: The number of time units specified in Time_Part.

argument.name: shortTime
argument.description: The short time value to analyze.

argument.name: TimePart
argument.description: The part of the short time value to return. "h" = hours, "m" = minutes, "s" = seconds

page.discussion: The ShortTime_Extract() function extracts the hours, minutes or seconds from a short time value.
page.example:
dim st as Y st = ctot("8:32 45.345 pm") ? shortTime_extract(st,"h") = 20
? shortTime_extract(st,"m") = 32
? shortTime_extract(st,"s") = 45.345 ? if(shortTime_extract(st,"h") > 11, "pm", "am") = "pm"
